title: glib build error when path to the python interpreter longer than 127 characters
body:
```
$ spack install glib %gcc@6.3.0
==> bzip2 is already installed in /cfs/fs2/home/users/aryczkowski/tmp/spack/opt/spack/linux-scientific6-x86_64/gcc-6.3.0/bzip2-1.0.6-o7ju7zmwqsgjf5gkorgim2mlwigf22o3

==> xz is already installed in /cfs/fs2/home/users/aryczkowski/tmp/spack/opt/spack/linux-scientific6-x86_64/gcc-6.3.0/xz-5.2.3-ykab3p2bvexcc2jdvwnhp6lbrvqcksr6

==> libffi is already installed in /cfs/fs2/home/users/aryczkowski/tmp/spack/opt/spack/linux-scientific6-x86_64/gcc-6.3.0/libffi-3.2.1-3ju6xlgrjvdlppvp2wdrtecfm4wkrhrr

==> Installing glib

==> Staging archive: /cfs/fs2/home/users/aryczkowski/tmp/spack/var/spack/stage/glib-2.55.1-pzwv4fqrkohxlvvpfplall4umdd2ddah/glib-2.55.1.tar.xz
==> Created stage in /cfs/fs2/home/users/aryczkowski/tmp/spack/var/spack/stage/glib-2.55.1-pzwv4fqrkohxlvvpfplall4umdd2ddah

==> Building glib [AutotoolsPackage]
==> Executing phase: 'autoreconf'
==> Executing phase: 'configure'
==> Executing phase: 'build'
==> Error: ProcessError: Command exited with status 2:
    'make' '-j20'

6 errors found in build log:
     [ ... ]
     1091  make[2]: Entering directory `/ram/tmp/aryczkowski/spack-stage/spack-stage-XuKPF6/glib-2.55.1/tests'
     1092  make  all-recursive

     1096    GEN      stamp-testmarshal.h
  >> 1097  /usr/bin/env: /cfs/fs2/home/users/aryczkowski/tmp/spack/opt/spack/linux-scientific6-x86_64/gcc-7.2.0/python-3.6.3-24qbbd4ylmql: No such file or directory
  >> 1098  make[4]: *** [stamp-testmarshal.h] Error 127
     1099  make[4]: Leaving directory `/ram/tmp/aryczkowski/spack-stage/spack-stage-XuKPF6/glib-2.55.1/tests/gobject'
  >> 1100  make[3]: *** [all-recursive] Error 1
     1101  make[3]: Leaving directory `/ram/tmp/aryczkowski/spack-stage/spack-stage-XuKPF6/glib-2.55.1/tests'
  >> 1102  make[2]: *** [all] Error 2
     1103  make[2]: Leaving directory `/ram/tmp/aryczkowski/spack-stage/spack-stage-XuKPF6/glib-2.55.1/tests'
  >> 1104  make[1]: *** [all-recursive] Error 1
     1105  make[1]: Leaving directory `/ram/tmp/aryczkowski/spack-stage/spack-stage-XuKPF6/glib-2.55.1'
  >> 1106  make: *** [all] Error 2

See build log for details:
  /cfs/fs2/home/users/aryczkowski/tmp/spack/var/spack/stage/glib-2.55.1-pzwv4fqrkohxlvvpfplall4umdd2ddah/glib-2.55.1/spack-build.out
```

```
$ uname -r
2.6.32-573.12.1.el6.x86_64

$ lsb_release -a
LSB Version:	:base-4.0-amd64:base-4.0-noarch:core-4.0-amd64:core-4.0-noarch:graphics-4.0-amd64:graphics-4.0-noarch:printing-4.0-amd64:printing-4.0-noarch
Distributor ID:	Scientific
Description:	Scientific Linux release 6.4 (Carbon)
Release:	6.4
Codename:	Carbon
```

I think the key line is  >> 1097  /usr/bin/env: /cfs/fs2/home/users/aryczkowski/tmp/spack/opt/spack/linux-scientific6-x86_64/gcc-7.2.0/python-3.6.3-24qbbd4ylmql: No such file or directory`. The python is in the directory `/cfs/fs2/home/users/aryczkowski/tmp/spack/opt/spack/linux-scientific6-x86_64/gcc-7.2.0/python-3.6.3-24qbbd4ylmqltmd2ggi43t7txghmi6u7`. Take notice, that the path got abbreviated on the 127th character.

